top_product: HR Automation Payroll Process EPF & ESI Labour law Professional Tax
ideal_referral: List of industries that suits as my ideal referrals: IT IT Enabled Services Manufacturing Educational Institutions
top_problem_solved: One of our clients was struggling due to the absence of a structured HR process, which forced them to focus solely on routine HR tasks instead of driving business growth. By implementing our comprehensive HR service, we alleviated their operational burden, enabling them to shift their focus back to strategic priorities. Our solution includes 24/7 employee monitoring through a user-friendly mobile app, ensuring seamless workforce management. Additionally, we maintain the statutory compliances such as EPF, ESI, Labour Welfare, and Professional Tax. Every employee is now effectively tracked and supported in real time, creating a stress-free and compliant HR environment.
my_favourite_bni_story: We recently attended a demo meeting with a prospective client. During the session, he noticed the BNI sticker on my laptop and asked if I was a member. I proudly shared that I’m part of the Benchmark chapter in Coimbatore. He acknowledged BNI as a reputable professional network with a rigorous entry checklist, to which I felt cherish. I then walked him through our HR Automation Process, and he was immediately impressed so much and signed the agreement on the spot. It was a truly memorable and rewarding moment, reaffirming the value of being part of the BNI community.
